entry.title: Applied Predictive Technologies: Market Basket
entry.content: Professionally developed web-based software in an agile environment that helps businesses make smart, data-driven decisions. Deployed a trend chart feature to clients by the end of the summer. Extensive experience with industry software development practices, reviewing software requirements, and writing unit tests.
entry.summary: Professionally developed web-based software in an agile environment that helps businesses make smart, data-driven decisions. Deployed a trend chart feature to clients by the end of the summer. Extensive experience with industry software development practices, reviewing software requirements, and writing unit tests.

entry.title: Graphics Engine
entry.content: Created a software based graphics engine in C. Retrofitted the engine with OpenGL to improve performance and add extensibility. Integrated the Open Dynamics Engine API to add physics interactions to the engine.
entry.summary: Created a software based graphics engine in C. Retrofitted the engine with OpenGL to improve performance and add extensibility. Integrated the Open Dynamics Engine API to add physics interactions to the engine.

entry.title: Elegit
entry.content: Developed a Git client that teaches students how to use Git while using it. Proficiency with test-driven development, Java’s concurrency framework, and software design methods.
entry.summary: Developed a Git client that teaches students how to use Git while using it. Proficiency with test-driven development, Java’s concurrency framework, and software design methods.

entry.title: Scheme Interpreter
entry.content: Wrote an interpreter for Scheme in C. Used standard C programming practices to keep code clean and organized. Utilized a debugger to prevent any memory leaks and to fix errors.
entry.summary: Wrote an interpreter for Scheme in C. Used standard C programming practices to keep code clean and organized. Utilized a debugger to prevent any memory leaks and to fix errors.

entry.title: Genetic Art
entry.content: Developed a genetic programming algorithm in Java to evolve aesthetically pleasing images.
entry.summary: Developed a genetic programming algorithm in Java to evolve aesthetically pleasing images.

entry.title: Asynchronous Tile Loading in VR
entry.content: Wrote a program which creates randomly generated Perlin noise terrain that is loaded asynchronously and supports VR teleportation.
entry.summary: Wrote a program which creates randomly generated Perlin noise terrain that is loaded asynchronously and supports VR teleportation.

entry.title: Musical Platforms
entry.content: Designed and programmed a 2D platformer game using Unity and C# that creates music. Developed an algorithm to store and playback music notes in the game. Source code available on GitHub.
entry.summary: Designed and programmed a 2D platformer game using Unity and C# that creates music. Developed an algorithm to store and playback music notes in the game. Source code available on GitHub.

entry.title: Taskiful
entry.content: Created a task manager with a thoughtfully designed code base which implements multiple design patterns such as MVC, the observer pattern, and the builder pattern.
entry.summary: Created a task manager with a thoughtfully designed code base which implements multiple design patterns such as MVC, the observer pattern, and the builder pattern.

entry.title: Housing Crisis
entry.content: Developed a unique tower defense game. Took ownership of the character path-finding and state machines. Source code available on GitHub.
entry.summary: Developed a unique tower defense game. Took ownership of the character path-finding and state machines. Source code available on GitHub.

entry.title: Medical Robot
entry.content: Implemented an A* pathfinding algorithm to guide a virtual robot around a virtual hospital. Also developed a heuristic using the Floyd-Warshall shortest path algorithm.
entry.summary: Implemented an A* pathfinding algorithm to guide a virtual robot around a virtual hospital. Also developed a heuristic using the Floyd-Warshall shortest path algorithm.
